Banner.Description: I have 2.5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, NodeJS and JavaScript, TypeScript and sometimes in Python applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2.5 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with MongoDB and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular developer
Description: Developed and maintained Angular applications resulting in increased increased efficiency by 20% in 3 months.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using angular.
Led front-end development of a EKYC project from built scratch using Angular with Micro-front end architecture.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a EKYC platform made in Angular, Java, and MongoDB.
Implemented responsive design using HTML and CSS resulting in 15% increase in user engagement.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular.
Implementation CI / CD in AWS. Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images and implementing caching techniques.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Knoxpo EKYC Project
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-KYC or electronic Know Your Customer is essentially the process by which KYC is done. So, eKYC is when authorised organisations and agents verify a customer’s identity and address digitally

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Connect 365 Automated Email campaign
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Connect 365 is a client attraction and sales automation platform that provides simple solutions to help small and medium sized businesses start more sales conversations with qualified prospects every day of the year while eliminating 90% of their marketing workload.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: L & T Electrical Smartshopt
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: L & T Electrical Smart shop is an e-commerce project in collaboration with Schneider Electric where all the electrical products user can buy. This project will be going to be operational in India and European countries.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: GITHUB BROWSER
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: GITHUB BROWSER is a github repository management tool the user can add a public repository and can check commits of branches and issues in that repositories

OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This a personal portfolio of Vamsi Ravilisetti in this Peronal details, Projects, Experiences Addded.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
